Set up your shipping

Now that shoppers know what you’re selling, help them figure out when and how they’ll receive their order.

Shipping rate

By selecting Charge flat rate, a fixed shipping price will be applied to the entire order.

Delivery destinations

Select Charge per product to change a custom rate for specific products.

Exceptions
Add exceptions

Select products that require a unique shipping price.

Select products to add exceptions to

Delivery destinations

Select Free pick up to allow shoppers to retrieve orders in person.
